pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Agile Widget Engine for Real-Time, Dynamic Visualizations // An unsorted collection of visualization widgets rendered in 'Tcl/Tk'https://www.tcl.tk/ to generate agile dashboards for your iterative simulations. Widgets include progress bars, counters, eavesdroppers, injectors, switches, and sliders for dynamic manipulation and visualization of simulation parameters.
